column6:
A new story arc begins as Ms. Marvel drafts two recruits from the Initiative...Machine Man and Sleepwalker?! When Araña is kidnapped, it's time for Carol Danvers to use her newly expanded strike force to squash an evil that's hit too close to home! The ongoing team of writer Brian Reed and artist Aaron Lopresti kicks off the three-part "Puppets" with a last-page reveal that'll have fans of female heroes buzzing!,2007,8
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | penciller:Aaron Lopresti | writer:Brian Reed | inker:Matt Ryan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
